attributes.action: cancel all further legislation until the constitutional crisis facing Parliament has been resolved and a general election held
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legislation is still being forced through Parliament with nowhere near enough time for debate, and at a time when the integrity of a number of MPs has been publicly questioned. An example of this was the Report Stage and Third Reading of the complex Policing and Crime Bill on 19th May.
We do not consider that such a hurried approach to such important legislation, particularly in the present circumstances, is an acceptable basis on which to form the law of the land.
We therefore call upon the Prime Minister to cancel all further legisalation, including that already in progress, until the constitutional crisis facing Parliament has been thoroughly resolved and the result of a general election determined.
